```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(qualtRics)

# list all TOPPSY survey id's
id1 <- 'SV_8pGFdxuCIijJyWW'
id2 <- 'SV_5BjwPDdPP9dJTF4'
id3 <- 'SV_d4LyS5pyp0DwhXo'


# get survey data DELPHI 1
df1 <- fetch_survey(surveyID = id1, verbose = FALSE, save_dir = "data/")

```

Number of responses: `r n1`

```{r}

n1 <- df1 |> 
  summarise(n = n()) |>
  pull() |> 
  print()

```
